full_output.summary: Effective student committed to learning, developing skills in programming and team contribution. Self-directed and energetic with experience in both autonomous or collaborative environments working independently or collaborating with team on group projects.

certifications.title: The Joy of Computing using Python

projects.name: Fake currency Detection With Machine learning and Image processing
projects.description: Trained a machine learning model using a dataset of genuine and counterfeit currency images. Incorporated features such as texture, color, and paper quality analysis for accurate classification. Applied image processing algorithms for edge detection, pattern recognition, and texture analysis. Enhanced the quality of currency images to improve the model's ability to distinguish between genuine and fake notes.

projects.name: MINI BLUTOOTH ROBOT CAR
projects.description: This project demonstrates Bluetooth connection with a car, specific Bluetooth technology attributes, mobile and robot elements, as well as how to operate a car using a mobile device.

experiences.description: Successfully clean the dataset and created the different data models using Machine Learning patterns to create training and testing data sets. I have learned how to use Python to implement machine learning algorithms, such as linear regression, logistic regression, decision trees, and support vector machines.
